Method Detail

configure

public void configure(Config.Configurator configurator)
               throws WizardException
Basic configuration. The configuration object passed is updated with information retrieved from the request object with which the configurator was created. The following parameters are accepted:
  • wizard
    • //*
  • origin
    • //*
  • context
  • debug

Parameters:
configurator - the configurator containing request information
Throws:
WizardException - if expected parameters were not given or ad bad content
Since:
MMBase-1.6.4

getAttributes

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAttributes()
Returns available attributes in a map, so they can be passed to the list stylesheet
